description: A boxy, elaborate-looking laser sight that provides you with a way to aim reliably and quickly at short distances.  This model is the commercial counterpart of a famous military laser sight employed in the U.S. Armed Forces.  <laser_sight_red>  <laser_sight_warning>

variants.description: A boxy, lightweight laser sight that provides the shooter with a reliable and quick way to aim at shorter distances.  <laser_sight_red>  This model is the commercial counterpart of the AN/PEQ-15, which is used by the U.S. Army and Navy.  The commercial variant features a weaker, civilian-legal laser, which is difficult to see during the day.  The Picatinny mount it comes with makes it easy to mount on most common platforms.  <variant_black>
